entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:19 a.m. CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 12. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
